segments.text: As of today it is . Memorial Day marks the end of the school year and the beginning of summer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So it's time for the kids to get outdoors ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ... and for us to get tans in our new bikinis .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not this Taiwanese girl . We don't like to get suntans .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's smart these days with all the news on skin cancer . Hey , there's everybody ! We made it !
segments.speaker: S2
